text: Spyro the Dragon is a video game character from the video game series with the same name, where he is the main hero. He is a purple dragon who goes on missions to help protect his home world which is the Dragon Realms. He is usually followed by a yellow dragonfly named Sparx and in the earlier games Sparx would be Spyro's health bar. His main attack in the games are ramming enemies with his horns. He also has 5 breath abilities: fire, water, bubbles, electricity and ice. ==Other websites== *Spyro the Dragon on Giant Bomb Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1998 Category:Fictional dragons Category:Video game protagonists
